sections.sectionContext: Enter your bet amount from the bet imput section below. Then click the roll button to roll the slot. After rolling ends, click the reset button and play more with roll button again.
If you get 2 same fruits, you will earn 3x of your bet amount. If you get 3 same fruits, you will earn 5x of your bet amount.
You can mute notifications by clicking the bell symbol on the top right corner of the game.
Place your bet on either Red/Green/Black. Wait for roulette to end rolling.
If you can guess the right color, you will win. You will receive 2x on Red and Black, 14x on Green.
You can mute notifications by clicking the bell symbol on the top right corner of the game.
Place your bet on either Skull/Ghost side of the coin. Wait for coin to end flipping.
If you bet on the right side of the coin, you will win. You will earn 2x of your bet amount.
You can mute notifications by clicking the bell symbol on the top right corner of the game.
